resources.string: Unable to upload file: %1$s. Contact Support. Error: %1$s
Unable to download file: %1$s. Contact Support. Error: %1$s
Session has expired. Please log back in.
Enter the custom domain you wish to add
This domain is already in use
By adding a custom domain you will be able to add a custom alias allowing you to send and receive emails from your custom domain.
1. Go to Go Daddy or whomever your domain provider is and access the DNS Manager where you can add MX and text records.
2. Delete any existing MX records before proceeding.
Add the following records in your DNS Manager. This will verify your domain ownership and configure Criptext email settings. Need help?
If you see the field Time To Live, enter 3600 seconds (1hour). Your host may not include a field called \"Name\", \"Host\", or \"Alias\".
Are you sure you want to delete your domain? Your mails will not disapear, but aliases with this domain will be deleted.
MX Records for domain: %1$s not found.
Go back and verify that you\'ve added the right information into your DNS records.
DNS Records For This\nDomain Were Not Found

%1$s is listed as your domain, make sure this is right; otherwise correct the domain on your Company Profile. Need help?\n\nAlso check that the DNS records on your domain are not empty; otherwise go back and add them from the previous steps.
Try again in a couple of minutes. Need help?
Create a secondary address for your existing inbox. You can add up to 3 aliases per domain.
You will be able to send and receive emails from this new address.
This address is already in use.
If you delete this Alias your emails will remain intact, but you will no longer be able to send or receive emails under that address. Are you sure you want to delete %1$s?
You have reached the max aliases you can create (%1$s) for this domain.
Aliases ending in @criptext.com cannot be deleted within 15 days from the day they were created.\n\nDays remaining: %1$d
Add custom email addresses with a Domain that you already own like you@company.com \n\nHelp us bring more awesome features to all, by joining Criptext Plus.
With Aliases you can manage multiple addresses in one inbox.\n\nHelp us bring more awesome features to all, by joining Criptext Plus.
Looks like you have lost connections with Wifi or other Internet connection
Your security is affected by deactivating this function. \n\n You can reactivate this function by going to Settings->Privacy.
Auto Backup ensures that your data is never lost.
Your emails are exclusively kept on your device, not on Criptext servers. \nThis means that if you delete the app or loose the device you will loose all your emails.
This address has no verified recovery email.
The recovery email has already been used %1$d times.
The recovery email used cannot be the same email address of the user.
You need to verify a Recovery Email before being able to send emails.\n\nThis is only so you can regain access to your account if you ever forget your password.
A new confirmation link was sent to your recovery email address: %1$s.
This version of the Criptext app is no longer supported, please update now to receive new emails
This will delete all emails on your spam folder
Are you sure you want to delete email(s) in Spam PERMANENTLY?
Let\'s get you started. Start off with your name ü§ì
This will be your new email address
This will allow you to regain access if you ever forget your password

For your privacy your emails are only kept on your device. It\'s best you turn on Drive backup to avoid losing your emails if you lose or change devices.Ô∏è

You won\'t be able to send emails until you verify your recovery email. This is for you security in case you ever forget your password.
